articles.description: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola says Cole Palmer was asking to leave the club for two years before he eventually joined Chelsea.
articles.title: Palmer wanted to leave Man City 'for two years'

articles.description: The Football Association defends its decision to scrap FA Cup replays from 2024-25 and says "all parties accepted" they could not continue.
articles.title: 'All parties accepted' replays should stop - FA

articles.description: World Athletics' decision to award prize money at the Paris Olympics "undermines the values of Olympism", a group of sport federations say.
articles.title: 2024 Olympic Games: Federations critical of World Athletics prize money

articles.description: Nottingham Forest's appeal against their Premier League points deduction will be heard on Wednesday.
articles.title: Nottingham Forest's points appeal hearing date set

articles.description: Lando Norris beats Lewis Hamilton and Fernando Alonso to take pole position for the sprint race at the Chinese Grand Prix in a hectic wet session.
articles.title: Chinese Grand Prix 2024: Lando Norris on sprint pole ahead of Lewis Hamilton

articles.description: Manchester United manager Erik Ten Hag says that Alejandro Garnacho has apologised for liking critical social media posts.
articles.title: Garnacho sorry for liking critical posts - Ten Hag

articles.description: Ryan Garcia weighs 3.2lb over the 140lb limit for Saturday's light-welterweight contest against compatriot Devin Haney in Brooklyn, New York.
articles.title: Devin Haney v Ryan Garcia: Challenger misses weight & cannot win WBC world title on Saturday

articles.description: The London Marathon elite men's field will be thinking of the late Kelvin Kiptum during Sunday's race, says Ethiopia's Kenenisa Bekele.
articles.title: London Marathon 2024: Kelvin Kiptum in thoughts of all runners - Kenenisa Bekele

articles.description: Follow live text and listen to BBC Radio Sussex commentary as Brighton face Everton in the Women's Super League.
articles.title: WSL: Brighton v Everton - radio & text

articles.description: BBC Sport football expert Chris Sutton takes on singer and Arsenal fan Sam Tompkins to make predictions for this weekend's FA Cup semi-final ties and Premier League games.
articles.title: Sutton's FA Cup & Premier League predictions v singer Sam Tompkins
